name: Underworld (QuarkTasche)
description:
Story: 

UnderWorld takes place before Upside Down and shows how the main character got into the dungeon.
Help your friends finally find a way into the dangeon!

https://quarktasche.itch.io/upsidedown


Controls:

Keyboard:
W A S D to move
E to interact

Controller:
Joystick to move
X to interact

Credits: 

Music/Sounds:
epidemicsound



Made with Unity
